events.message: Hello, I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle the customer's request.
Hi! I'm sorry to hear you got the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out quickly for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and proceed?
Sure, my order number is #123456789 and I've attached a photo showing the incorrect item received.
Thank you for the details. I have processed a full refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected in 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund process. I appreciate your help sorting this out promptly.
The refund has been confirmed processed, and the case is now resolved per customer confirmation.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund without any issues and if you need further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is good now, thank you for the great support!
Closing the case now since the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and no further action is required.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their experience with our support.
